__e: Get out of here! Screw you, Your Holiness! You think I didn't see... the way you looked at me when I said I'd go to bed with you?

Since you walked in through that door they've been eyeballing you.
Think how it would make you feel if somebody were staring at you.

It's not that I mind being stared at. That's part of being a female.
I saw you staring at me and I didn't know who you were.
He just sat there staring into the darkness.
And she was just sitting there staring out the window.
He keeps staring out the window as if he's looking for someone.

I stared into his eyes for the longest time, just looking for some sign he was still in there.
